content: Hi All!Big day ahead for us, Today I'm at Arsenal Stadium for a match that has a bit more riding on this than most of us realise.. Â   Arsenal would expect to get 3 points out of this, and Southampton are dying for at least 1 point to keep some faint hopes of staying up alive.BEERS WITH STEVE:Tonight I am joined in the Sportsbet.io Box at Emirates Stadium by Bitcointalk legendary members: Trofo and Cryptofrka!!These guys are running some fantastic promotions and games on bitcointalk for sportsbet.io and its a pleasure to have them with us this evening!PROMO:Please screenshot at least 1 of your bet slips of the Arsenal v Southampton match tonight and put on this thread, and you are in the running for the next SPECIAL Edition of Beers with Steve!!(No odds requirement, no minimum stake, pls don't cash-out.. Event: Time, date + place to be revealed closer to the event!)Best of luck and tune into ClubhouseTV tonight, either on-site or on our new Kick channel >  https://kick.com/clubhousetvregards, Steve.Sportsbet.io** Pls check out this promo from Trofo and Cryptofrka!!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438071.msg62122829#msg62122829
